EmailTemplate.name: New 2016 National IPA/TCPN Tech Announcement
EmailTemplate.subject: BREAKING NEWS: Office Depot & National IPA/TCPN Technology Announcement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
New TCPN Technology Products and Services Contract
Enjoy great savings on tech products, services and support.
Business Account Login | Find a store | Customer Service: 888.263.3423
My Account Technology Furniture Ink & Toner Paper Office Supplies
Under the new agreement, which takes effect August 1, 2016, we’ll be offering a great selection of competitively priced tech solutions for your agency. Other benefits include: • Exceptional delivery, fulfillment and turnaround time based on our • nationwide distribution network, combined with our retail store footprint • An expanded technology core list with significant savings on our • highest volume tech items • Discounts on 120,000+ tech products/services at • business.officedepot.com • Additional access to 275,000+ tech items • Complete tech catalog offering and Educational Technology (EdTech) • program • Continued excellent support from our dedicated and highly trained • technology field-based and inside sales and support team • Enjoy additional incentives, including: • – Annual tech % threshold rebate • – Annual tech flat threshold rebate • New functionality and usability enhancements on our world-class • website, business.officedepot.com
Want to learn more about the great benefits of the new technology contract, plus how Office Depot can help your agency save more? Contact me today!
©2016 Office Depot, Inc. All rights reserved. 6600 North Military Trail, Boca Raton, FL 33496 Have questions? Contact us online or call 888-2-OFFICE (888.263.3423). Privacy Policy
